an2.11:2.2: yamidaṃ → yadidaṃ (si, sya-all) | sekhānametaṃ → sekhametaṃ (bj, sya-all, km); sekhānaṃ etaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
an2.15:1.2: na phāsuṃ → na phāsukaṃ (bj); na phāsu (mr) | viharissantī’ti → viharissanti (bj, sya-all, km, mr)
an2.15:2.4: Maṃ so → tasmā maṃ so (sya-all); taṃ maṃ so (pts-vp-pli1ed)
an2.19:1.3: cedaṃ → no ce taṃ (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
